summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a chronology document titled 'MCC Timeline.xlsx' related to the Epstein case. The document appears to be internal prosecution communication regarding case preparation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of an email transmitting a chronology document titled 'MCC Timeline.xlsx' related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Chronology Email Transmission
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email containing a chronology document ('MCC Timeline.xlsx') to an unspecified recipient.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York sent an email on August 14, 2019, transmitting a chronology document.
The attached document is titled 'MCC Timeline.xlsx', suggesting it contains a timeline of events related to the Epstein case.
The email indicates internal communication within the prosecution team preparing the case against Jeffrey Epstein.
